meeting_info.organization: Parks, Trails, and the Environment Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the June 3, 2024 Parks, Trails and Environment Committee Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: April 2025 Dallas Cup Overview
agenda_items.description: Overview of the International Youth Soccer Tournament.
agenda_items.presenter: Jimmy Smith, FC Dallas; Andy Swift, Dallas Cup

agenda_items.title: Dallas Community Air Management Program Annual Update
agenda_items.description: Annual update on the community air management program.
agenda_items.presenter: Carlos Evans, Director, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability

agenda_items.title: Q3 Comprehensive Environmental & Climate Action Plan (CECAP) Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Comprehensive Environmental & Climate Action Plan.
agenda_items.presenter: M. Elizabeth (Liz) Cedillo-Pereira, Assistant City Manager; Carlos Evans, Director, Office of Environmental Quality & Sustainability

agenda_items.title: Upcoming August 14, 2024 Agenda Items for Council Consideration
agenda_items.description: Discussion on upcoming agenda items including Texas Commission on Environmental Quality (TCEQ) Air Monitoring Grant Contracts.
agenda_items.presenter: M. Elizabeth (Liz) Cedillo-Pereira, Assistant City Manager; Carlos Evans, Director, Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability

agenda_items.title: State Legislative Priorities Update
agenda_items.presenter: Carrie Rogers, Director, Office of Government Affairs

agenda_items.title: Summer 2024 Pool Operations Update
agenda_items.description: Update on pool operations for summer 2024.
agenda_items.presenter: John Jenkins, Director, Parks and Recreation Department
